issue.title: Is the new simulator working for anyone?

content.raw:
Restart you machine and try again with just one vehicle.  It'll still show the \[Err\] \[[LevelManager.cc:134](http://levelmanager.cc:134)\] and \[Err\] \[[VisibilityTable.cc:57](http://visibilitytable.cc:57)\] messages on the console, so ignore those for now.

>  ign launch -v 4 virtual\_stix.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1\_SENSOR\_CONFIG\_1

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/4181326500-Config-1.png)
content.html:
Restart you machine and try again with just one vehicle. It'll still show the [Err] [LevelManager.cc:134] and [Err] [VisibilityTable.cc:57] messages on the console, so ignore those for now.

ign launch -v 4 virtual_stix.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1
